version_description: Add your Media directly from Google Drive, another great option to add outstanding content for your Plann!

Need a reminder of what goals you're are working towards on Instagram?

Keep your eye on the target - you can now note down your weekly focus from right inside Plann! Your tangible, measurable goals can now be front of mind - for you, or the team!

PLUS!
Crop images and save them for Instagram Stories with our extended crop sizes!

This update is another DOOZY.

- Schedule and Plann your Instagram Stories!
Even if your images/videos are older than 24hrs, we'll make sure they're still available for you to post.

- Repost User Generated Content
Discover new content via hashtags and other Instagrammers.
(Don't forget to give them credit!)

- All of our updates come with Performance enhancements, this one also comes with a new-look menu to make it easier to find your analytics.

Our business exists to help yours, if you enjoy using Plann please help us by rating our App in the app store.

Our business exists to help yours, if you enjoy using Plann please help us by rating our App in the app store.

INSTAGRAM STRATEGY:
Telling your brand story makes it easier for more people to fall in love with you!

Introducing our new Instagram Strategy feature to help you strategise and Plann your brand story, with your grid, AND your stories.

There are also some great new tweaks under the hood, including adding white borders to your images and story posts.

Please help us continue to build great features for you by rating the app lots of shiny stars!

To 2018! Let's go!

Best,
Christy, Plann Founder

INSTAGRAM POSTING:
While Instagram test their posting functionality (and cause posting problems for some lovely Plann'ers!), we've added a work-around so that your Plann/scheduled images are always at the top of your camera roll for you to select.

We'll be keeping a very close eye on Instagram's changes, if you spot anything new that might be specific to your country or device, let us know so we can get onto it as soon as we can.

Please help us continue to build great features for you by rating the app lots of shiny stars!

To 2018! Let's go!

Best,
Christy, Plann Founder

◉ Performance Updates.
◉ INSTAGRAM POSTING:
While Instagram test their posting functionality (and cause posting problems for some lovely Plann'ers!), we've added a work-around so that your Plann/scheduled images are always at the top of your camera roll for you to select.

We'll be keeping a very close eye on Instagram's changes, if you spot anything new that might be specific to your country or device, let us know so we can get onto it as soon as we can.

◉ INSTAGRAM STRATEGY:
Telling your brand story makes it easier for more people to fall in love with ou!

Introducing our new Instagram Strategy feature to help you strategise and Plann your brand story, with your grid, AND your stories.

There are also some great new tweaks under the hood, including adding white borders to your images and story posts.

Please help us continue to build great features for you by rating the app lots of shiny stars!

To 2018! Let's go!

Best,
Christy, Plann Founder

Struggling with finding the right hashtags?

Break out the best china and smash it on the floor - you can now use Plann to organise and discover hashtags with our new mentions feature.

We recommend hashtags with mentions that aren’t too high, so we’ve colour coded hashtags to give you a helping hand with which ones to select.

Easily build and save more hashtags sets than before.

PLUS, when you’re scheduling? We’ve made it easier for you to decide when to set the timer based on your best times.

Clean up the mess in the morning - we’ve got planning to do! Let’s go!
Performance updates

Struggling with finding the right hashtags?

Break out the best china and smash it on the floor - you can now use Plann to organise and discover hashtags with our new mentions feature.

We recommend hashtags with mentions that aren’t too high, so we’ve colour coded hashtags to give you a helping hand with which ones to select.

Easily build and save more hashtags sets than before.

PLUS, when you’re scheduling? We’ve made it easier for you to decide when to set the timer based on your best times.

Clean up the mess in the morning - we’ve got plann'ing to do! Let’s go!

We wish every Plann update was packed with features, excitement and adventure, BUT, just like in real life - sometimes you have to spend time tidying up the filing cabinet (*eugh).

This update cleans up a number of things under-the-hood. Vroom Vroom.

If you love using Plann, please help us by rating the app we’re so passionate about making for you!

Adding images from Dropbox?

Visual people rejoice, those horrible Dropbox filenames have now become beautiful thumbnails so you can easily see what media you’re importing.

Plann for Business was a huge hit!
We’re thrilled to have SO many of you join us so we’ve added extra horsepower in this update to make sure you continue to get the best experience using Plann - that’s all we want for you.
What’s Plann for Business?
Login to Plann with a Facebook Business Account (rather than an Instagram handle) and you’ll find some huge new features designed to help you grow on Instagram even faster

Plann for Business was a huge hit!
We’re thrilled to have SO many of you join us so we’ve added extra horsepower in this update to make sure you continue to get the best experience using Plann - that’s all we want for you.
What’s Plann for Business?
Login to Plann with a Facebook Business Account (rather than an Instagram handle) and you’ll find some huge new features designed to help you grow on Instagram even faster

*Plann 2.0!*

Are you running a business on Instagram? Perfect!
We've created advanced features for you if you're running a business with Plann.

Choose to login with a Facebook Business Page (connected to an Instagram Business Account) and you'll find:

- Advanced Analytics (including for your stories!)
- Respond to your comments from inside Plann.
- Find comments and captions you've been tagged in.

Don't have a business account? Although we highly encourage you to switch over to maximize Instagrams features, this update has some speed updates for you too.

Any questions, shake the app while it's open to get in touch with the Plann team.

Need help setting up a business account?
Visit plannthat.com/plann-blog for details

We’re thrilled to have SO many of you join us so we’ve added extra horsepower in this update to make sure you continue to get the best experience using Plann - that’s all we want for you.

What’s Plann for Business?
Login to Plann with a Facebook Business Account (rather than an Instagram handle) and you’ll find some huge new features designed to help you grow on Instagram even faster!

NEW FEATURE ALERT:


Introducing Workspaces!

Planning with a team and organizing your accounts just got easier.

With Workspaces, you can now manage multiple accounts within different teams.
We've also done some work under the hood to squash some pesky bugs and supercharge the performance of Plann (just in time for the holidays!) so you can supercharge your Instagram growth.

Questions or feedback?
Email: support@plannthat.com
Instagram: @plannthat

ROUTINE MAINTENANCE

With changes to the way logins are handled at Facebook, we will be backing up your account during this update.

If you previously logged in with Instagram, you’ll receive a popup that your work is being backed up. Please DO NOT close the app!

The great news is that once completed, you’ll have access to Plann across all of your devices, including new features right from your desktop computer!

Questions or feedback?
Email: support@plannthat.com
Instagram: @plannthat

ROUTINE MAINTENANCE

With changes to the way logins are handled at Facebook, we will be backing up your account during this update.

If you previously logged in with Instagram, you’ll receive a popup that your work is being backed up. Please DO NOT close the app!

The great news is that once completed, you’ll have access to Plann across all of your devices, including new features right from your desktop computer!

Questions or feedback?
Email: support@plannthat.com
Instagram: @plannthat
routine maintenance

Facebook (aka Instagram) asked to take a look under the hood at Plann, and of course, we said yes!

While we’re going through their process, a few features will be temporarily unavailable.

If you are having trouble logging in, seeing a few weird code-looking error messages, or finding some features not quite working as they should - this is part of the temporary outage.

In the meantime, login with email to use Plann to upload media, edit your images, draft your captions, and schedule your posts as normal.

For the latest updates, be sure to visit our help desk at https://help.plannthat.com

ROUTINE MAINTENANCE

With changes to the way logins are handled at Facebook, we will be backing up your account during this update.

If you previously logged in with Instagram, you’ll receive a popup that your work is being backed up. Please DO NOT close the app!

The great news is that once completed, you’ll have access to Plann across all of your devices, including new features right from your desktop computer!

Questions or feedback?

Email: support@plannthat.com

With huge dreams to make your social media life easier, we’ve redesigned and rebuilt the app from scratch! It’s everything you love about Plann, just a little fancier!


Highlights Include:
- Multi-Stories — create and review a whole sequence of Instagram stories in one view.
- Content Prompts — strategic prompts for 50+ industries on what to post when you’re stuck
- Artistic Text Overlay Tool — find it nestled in our filters
- Offline Mode — plan your socials no matter where you are
- Free Stock Libraries — free professional videos and images from Pexels, Unsplash, and Pixabay, ready for commercial use
- Integration with Canva Stories App — create beautiful stories templates
- New ‘Share To Plann’ Options — share from your favorite content creation and photo editing apps directly into Plann
- Full Calendar View — see your social media plan from a weekly or monthly view
- Draft or Scheduled Views — toggle to see what’s scheduled and ready-to-go

- Content Prompts — strategic prompts for 50+ industries on what to post when you’re stuck
- Artistic Text Overlay Tool — find it nestled in our filters
- Offline Mode — plan your socials no matter where you are
- Free Stock Libraries — free professional videos and images from Pexels, Unsplash, and Pixabay, ready for commercial use
- Integration with Canva Stories App — create beautiful stories templates
- New ‘Share To Plann’ Options — share from your favorite content creation and photo editing apps directly into Plann
- Full Calendar View — see your social media plan from a weekly or monthly view
- Draft or Scheduled Views — toggle to see what’s scheduled and ready-to-go

With huge dreams to make your social media life easier, we’ve redesigned and rebuilt the app from scratch! It’s everything you love about Plann, just a little fancier!

Highlights Include:
- Multi-Stories — create and review a whole sequence of Instagram stories in one view.
- Content Prompts — strategic prompts for 50+ industries on what to post when you’re stuck
- Artistic Text Overlay Tool — find it nestled in our filters
- Offline Mode — plan your socials no matter where you are
- Free Stock Libraries — free professional videos and images from Pexels, Unsplash, and Pixabay, ready for commercial use
- Integration with Canva Stories App — create beautiful stories templates
- New ‘Share To Plann’ Options — share from your favorite content creation and photo editing apps directly into Plann
- Full Calendar View — see your social media plan from a weekly or monthly view
- Draft or Scheduled Views — toggle to see what’s scheduled and ready-to-go

THIS UPDATE we're helping organise your Instagram accounts into 'brands', especially helpful if you're using Plann on desktop.

What's a brand?
It's what we call your business, or brand name (like 'Plann', or 'HouseOfHipstersDecor' or your name 'Louise Henry' if it's a personal brand.) that you’d use across the whole internet.

Can we ask a small favour? If you're loving all the new updates, we need to let Apple know we're a slam dunk, quality product in order for us to continue to release new features for you. It would mean the world if you leave us a great review (we'd give you one if we could!) Thank you!

P.S. Want to make the most of auto posting but don't know how? Visit the app menu to learn more!

Questions or feedback?
Email: support@plannthat.com
Instagram: @plannthat

Media Collections Now Available in Plann App

Update your Plann App to find your Media Collections sync’d across all of your devices, teams and computers!

ORGANIZE EVERYTHING! NEW!

- Access content you've uploaded and organized from Plann Desktop.
- Upload content into your social schedule from pre-organized media collections.
- Create, upload, organize and manage ALL of your social media content on the go.
- Share content with yourself, and your team members across all devices, anytime!

There’s nothing worse than uploading content, favoriting a photo to post, or creating a system where everything is neatly organized only to never be able to find it again.
Find your organized files from Plann desktop in this update OR, start your own content organization system with this powerful media storage update! Let’s go!

Automatically pre-tag accounts before you post!

Now available for content ready for Instagram, use Plann to pre-tag friends, collaborators, photographers, and more in your posts before they’re automatically published to Instagram!

Pre-tagging accounts is a great way to:
— instantly notify anyone you’ve tagged, nudging them to save, share or engage with your post.
— streamline processes and cut down on time spent scheduling.
— give yourself extra time to engage, create partnerships, and grow your brand.
— improve the health of your Instagram account through community engagement.

Tagging people is part of our Plann Auto Post Expansion features and available as part of any Plann Plus subscriptions using an Instagram business account — give it a try!

LOVE IT AS MUCH AS WE DO?

If you love seeing Plann consistently roll out new features and want more, we need your help! Help us let Apple know we’re a slam dunk, quality product so we can keep building new things for you. It would mean the world to us if you leave us a great review (we’d give you one if we could!).

Questions, compliments or feedback?

Instagram: @plannthat
